title: MoneyCard signs up 5,000th member
text:
MoneyCard signs up 5,000th member 21 July 2015 Save 
The 5,000 th agent has now signed up to Funway Holidays’ MoneyCard. 
Launched in July 4, 2013, the joint rewards scheme is backed by Collette, If Only and Norwegian Cruise Line (UK) and allows agents to receive financial rewards without any hassle. 
The 5,000 th agent to sign up for the scheme was Thomas Cook’s Veronica Jackson who won a free meal out. 
Funway Holidays marketing and sales executive Laura Smith said: “5,000 MoneyCard sign-ups is a milestone that we are thrilled about as the scheme’s popularity continues to soar. 
“The positive response from travel agents is fantastic and true testament to its success. 
“We are excited about the future as we look to grow the agent fan club even further and welcome more new partners, ensuring MoneyCard continues to be the best loyalty scheme for travel agents.”
